name: mushroom potholder
notes:
this tapestry crochet **mushroom potholder** is my latest addition to the [farmhouse collection][1].

it's the perfect hot pad pattern for your country-style kitchen. it also makes a great present for all lovers of nature and woods.

you can also use the pattern to make blanket squares, pillowcases, wall hangings, bags, etc.

the pdf file includes written instructions and a color chart.
 
**materials**
– dk (3, light) cotton yarn in 2 contrasting colors: color a (a) and color b (b)
– 3.0-mm (c/2 usa, 11 uk) hook
– tapestry needle

**yarn & yardage**
i used paintbox yarns cotton dk in the following colors and amounts:
– a – vanilla cream (408) – 50-55 yds / 45-50 m
– b – coffee bean (411) – 30-35 yds / 27-32 m

**size**
6.7” (17 cm) by 7.3” (18.5 cm).

**gauge**
28 sc for 26 rows in 4” (10 cm) worked in sc tapestry crochet.
